Detailed Description

Get data about a user.

After the normal header the request packet contains: {tabular}{lll} Pos & Size & Destription \ USER_REQUEST_HEADER_SIZE & 4 bytes & Group type \ {tabular}

Create a packet to get data about one user.

Parameters:
packetID The ID of this packet.
requestID The ID of the reuest that whants the reply of this request packet.
UID The identification of the user.
elementTypes The types of userelements to return, use operator | and UserContants::UserItemType fields.
notFromCache If to get clean user not from cache.
